content: k1 3 times * yo k1 finishing 2 times yo ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 weave in all loose threads wash and block times repeat from * to last 12 sts yo k1 2 times enjoy yo ssk ssk k2tog k1 yo k3 row 9 k3 yo k across to center st yo k1 center st yo k across to last 3 sts yo k3 row 11 k3 yo k2 yo ssk ssk k1 k2tog k2tog yo k1 2times yo * k1 yo 3 times ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 2 times yo repeat from * to 15 st before center st k1 yo 3 times ssk ssk k2tog 3 times yo k1 2 times yo k1 center st yo k1 2 times yo ssk 3 times k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 times * yo k1 2 times yo ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 times repeat from * to last 16 sts yo k1 2 times yo ssk ssk k1 k2tog k2tog yo k2 yo k3 row 13 k3 edge sts yo k across to center st yo k1 center st yo k across to last 3 sts yo k3 row 15 k3 yo k1 * k1 yo 3 times ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 2 times yo repeat from * to 1 st before center st k1 yo k1 center st yo k1 * yo k1 2 times yo ssk ssk cdd k2tog k2tog yo k1 3 times repeat from * to last 4 sts k1 yo k3 row 16 k3 yo p to last 3 sts ending with yo k3 ***see designer note above*** copyright 2010 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may photocopy instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com note charts only show right side row the edge stitches are not charted always knit the first 3 stitches and last 3 stitches of every row on wrong side row knit 3 edge sts yo purl across to last 3 sts yo knit 3 edge sts legend k on rs p on ws / k2tog \ ssk pattern repeat o yo ^ cdd center stitch chart 1 o o o o / / ^ \ \ o o o o o o o o / / ^ \ \ o o o o 1 chart 2 right side o / \ \ o o o o o o / / ^ \ \ o o o o o o / / ^ \ \ o o o o 15 o o 13 o \ \ o o o o o / / ^ \ \ o o o o o o / / \ \ o o 11 o o 9 o \ o o o o / / ^ \ \ o o o o o o / / \ o 7 o o 5 o o o o / / ^ \ \ o o o
